TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用於釋放 Unmanaged 資源的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for releasing unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面的主要用途是釋放 unmanaged 的資源。The primary use of this interface is to release unmanaged resources. 記憶體回收行程自動釋放該物件已不再使用時，配置給受管理物件的記憶體。The garbage collector automatically releases the memory allocated to a managed object when that object is no longer used. 不過，不能夠預測何時會發生記憶體回收。However, it is not possible to predict when garbage collection will occur. 此外，記憶體回收行程不認得的視窗控制代碼等的 unmanaged 資源，或開啟檔案和資料流。Furthermore, the garbage collector has no knowledge of unmanaged resources such as window handles, or open files and streams. 使用明確與記憶體回收行程釋放 unmanaged 的資源，搭配這個介面的方法。Use the method of this interface to explicitly release unmanaged resources in conjunction with the garbage collector. 物件的取用者不再需要物件時，可以呼叫這個方法。The consumer of an object can call this method when the object is no longer needed. > [!WARNING] > 它是中斷變更，以便加入現有類別的介面。It is a breaking change to add the interface to an existing class. 因為您的型別既有的取用者無法呼叫，您就無法確定您的類型所持有的 unmanaged 的資源，將會釋放。Because pre-existing consumers of your type cannot call , you cannot be certain that unmanaged resources held by your type will be released. 因為實作稱為取用者類型的執行個體所擁有的資源不再需要時，您可能必須換行中的受管理的物件（建議的替代做法），或應該覆寫釋放 unmanaged 的資源的消費者忘記呼叫。Because the implementation is called by the consumer of a type when the resources owned by an instance are no longer needed, you should either wrap the managed object in a (the recommended alternative), or you should override to free unmanaged resources in the event that the consumer forgets to call . > [!IMPORTANT] > 在.NET Framework 中，c + + 編譯器支援決定性的資源處置，並不允許直接實作方法。In the .NET Framework, the C++ compiler supports deterministic disposal of resources and does not allow direct implementation of the method. 如需如何的詳細討論此介面和方法可用，請參閱[回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)主題。For a detailed discussion about how this interface and the method are used, see the [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md) topics. ## 使用實作 IDisposable 的物件Using an object that implements IDisposable 如果您的應用程式會直接使用該物件會實作介面，您應該呼叫物件的實作，當您完成使用它。If your app simply uses an object that implements the interface, you should call the object's implementation when you are finished using it. 根據您的程式語言，您可以執行下列其中一種：Depending on your programming language, you can do this in one of two ways: - 使用的語言建構例如`using`在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中的陳述式。By using a language construct such as the `using` statement in C# and Visual Basic. - 藉由呼叫換行中的實作`try` / `finally`區塊。By wrapping the call to the implementation in a `try`/`finally` block. > [!NOTE] > 文件型別都會實作請注意，並包含提醒來呼叫其實作。Documentation for types that implement note that fact and include a reminder to call its implementation. ### C# 和 Visual Basic 所使用的陳述式The C# and Visual Basic Using statement 如果您的語言支援的建構，例如[使用](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/using.md)C# 中的陳述式和[使用](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/using-statement.md)在 Visual Basic 中的陳述式，您可以使用它而不是明確地呼叫自己。If your language supports a construct such as the [using](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/using.md) statement in C# and the [Using](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/using-statement.md) statement in Visual Basic, you can use it instead of explicitly calling yourself. 下列範例會使用這種方法在定義`WordCount`可以保留檔案中的字組數目的相關資訊的類別。The following example uses this approach in defining a `WordCount` class that preserves information about a file and the number of words in it. [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/cs/calling1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/vb/calling1.vb#1)] `using`陳述式是實際的語法便利性。The `using` statement is actually a syntactic convenience. 在編譯時期，語言編譯器實作中繼語言 (IL) `try` / `finally`區塊。At compile time, the language compiler implements the intermediate language (IL) for a `try`/`finally` block. 如需有關`using`陳述式，請參閱[Using 陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/using-statement.md)或[使用陳述式](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/using-statement.md)主題。For more information about the `using` statement, see the [Using Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/using-statement.md) or [using Statement](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/using-statement.md) topics. ### Try/Finally 區塊The Try/Finally block 如果您的程式語言不支援的建構，例如`using`陳述式，以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中，或如果您不想使用它，您可以呼叫實作從`finally`區塊`try` / `finally`陳述式。If your programming language does not support a construct like the `using` statement in C# or Visual Basic, or if you prefer not to use it, you can call the implementation from the `finally` block of a `try`/`finally` statement. 下列範例會取代`using`封鎖先前的範例，但在`try` / `finally`區塊。The following example replaces the `using` block in the previous example with a `try`/`finally` block. [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/cs/calling2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/vb/calling2.vb#2)] 如需有關`try` / `finally`模式，請參閱[再試一次...Catch...Finally 陳述式](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/try-catch-finally-statement.md)，[再試一次最後](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/try-finally.md)，或[try-finally 陳述式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/514400c1-c322-4bf3-9e48-3047240b8a82)。For more information about the `try`/`finally` pattern, see [Try...Catch...Finally Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/try-catch-finally-statement.md), [try-finally](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/try-finally.md), or [try-finally Statement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/514400c1-c322-4bf3-9e48-3047240b8a82). ## 實作 IDisposableImplementing IDisposable 您應該實作只有當您的類型會直接使用 unmanaged 的資源。You should implement only if your type uses unmanaged resources directly. 類型的消費者可以呼叫您實作，以執行個體已不再需要時釋放資源。The consumers of your type can call your implementation to free resources when the instance is no longer needed. 為了處理呼叫的失敗的情況，您應該的使用的類別衍生自包裝的 unmanaged 的資源，或您應覆寫參考類型的方法。To handle cases in which they fail to call , you should either use a class derived from to wrap the unmanaged resources, or you should override the method for a reference type. 在任一情況下，您可以使用方法，以執行任何清理之後需要使用的 unmanaged 的資源，例如，釋出、 釋放或重設 unmanaged 的資源。In either case, you use the method to perform whatever cleanup is necessary after using the unmanaged resources, such as freeing, releasing, or resetting the unmanaged resources. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您要定義基底類別所使用的 unmanaged 的資源，，或可能有，應該處置的子類別，您應該實作方法，並提供的第二個多載`Dispose`，如下所述的下一步一節。If you are defining a base class that uses unmanaged resources and that either has, or is likely to have, subclasses that should be disposed, you should implement the method and provide a second overload of `Dispose`, as discussed in the next section. ## IDisposable 與繼承階層IDisposable and the inheritance hierarchy 應該是可處置的子類別的基底類別必須實作，如下所示。A base class with subclasses that should be disposable must implement as follows. 您應該使用此模式，每當您實作上沒有任何型別`sealed`(`NotInheritable`在 Visual Basic 中)。You should use this pattern whenever you implement on any type that isn't `sealed` (`NotInheritable` in Visual Basic). - 它應該提供一個公用、 非虛擬方法和一個受保護虛擬`Dispose(Boolean disposing)`方法。It should provide one public, non-virtual method and a protected virtual `Dispose(Boolean disposing)` method. - 方法必須呼叫`Dispose(true)`和應該隱藏最終處理的效能。The method must call `Dispose(true)` and should suppress finalization for performance. - 基底類型不應該包含任何完成項。The base type should not include any finalizers. 下列程式碼片段會反映基底類別的處置模式。The following code fragment reflects the dispose pattern for base classes. 它會假設您的類型不覆寫方法。It assumes that your type does not override the method. [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/cs/base1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/vb/base1.vb#3)] 如果您不要覆寫方法，您的類別應實作下列的模式。If you do override the method, your class should implement the following pattern. [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/cs/base2.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/vb/base2.vb#5)] 子類別應實作可處置模式，如下所示：Subclasses should implement the disposable pattern as follows: - 它們必須覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 並呼叫基底類別 `Dispose(Boolean)` 實作。They must override `Dispose(Boolean)` and call the base class `Dispose(Boolean)` implementation. - 如有需要，它們可以提供完成項。They can provide a finalizer if needed. 完成項必須呼叫 `Dispose(false)`。The finalizer must call `Dispose(false)`. 請注意，在衍生的類別不本身會實作介面，並不包含無參數方法。Note that derived classes do not themselves implement the interface and do not include a parameterless method. 它們只會覆寫基底類別`Dispose(Boolean)`方法。They only override the base class `Dispose(Boolean)` method. 下列程式碼片段會反映在衍生類別的處置模式。The following code fragment reflects the dispose pattern for derived classes. 它會假設您的類型不覆寫方法。It assumes that your type does not override the method. [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/cs/derived1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.idisposable/vb/derived1.vb#4)] ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立資源類別可實作介面。The following example demonstrates how to create a resource class that implements the interface. [!code-cpp[System.IDisposable.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IDisposable.Dispose Example/CPP/idisposabledispose.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IDisposable.Dispose Example/CS/idisposabledispose.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IDisposable.Dispose Example/VB/idisposabledispose.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與釋放 (Free)、釋放 (Release) 或重設 Unmanaged 資源相關聯之應用程式定義的工作。

span.span: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法可以關閉或釋放 unmanaged 的資源，例如檔案、 資料流，以及實作此介面之類別的執行個體所持有的控制代碼。Use this method to close or release unmanaged resources such as files, streams, and handles held by an instance of the class that implements this interface. 依照慣例，這個方法用來執行與釋放物件所掌握的資源相關聯的所有工作或準備重複使用的物件。By convention, this method is used for all tasks associated with freeing resources held by an object, or preparing an object for reuse. > [!WARNING] > 如果您使用的類別，實作介面，您應該呼叫其當您完成使用類別的實作。If you are using a class that implements the interface, you should call its implementation when you are finished using the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 使用實作 IDisposable 的物件 > 一節主題。For more information, see the "Using an object that implements IDisposable" section in the topic. 當實作這個方法，請確定所有持有的資源釋放透過內含項目階層架構的呼叫傳播。When implementing this method, ensure that all held resources are freed by propagating the call through the containment hierarchy. 例如，如果物件 A 會配置物件 B，而物件 B 會配置物件 C，然後 A 的實作必須呼叫b，它必須接著呼叫c 上For example, if an object A allocates an object B, and object B allocates an object C, then A's implementation must call on B, which must in turn call on C. > [!IMPORTANT] > C + + 編譯器支援決定性的資源處置，並不允許直接實作方法。The C++ compiler supports deterministic disposal of resources and does not allow direct implementation of the method. 物件也必須呼叫如果基底類別會實作其基底類別方法。An object must also call the method of its base class if the base class implements . 如需有關實作在基底類別和子類別，請參閱中的 < IDisposable 和繼承階層架構 > 一節主題。For more information about implementing on a base class and its subclasses, see the "IDisposable and the inheritance hierarchy" section in the topic. 如果物件方法呼叫一次以上，物件必須忽略所有呼叫的第一個之後。If an object's method is called more than once, the object must ignore all calls after the first one. 物件不能擲回例外狀況如果其多次呼叫方法。The object must not throw an exception if its method is called multiple times. 執行個體方法以外可以擲回時已經處置資源。Instance methods other than can throw an when resources are already disposed. 使用者可能預期要使用特定的慣例來代表已配置的狀態與 釋放狀態的資源類型。Users might expect a resource type to use a particular convention to denote an allocated state versus a freed state. 舉例來說，這是資料流類別，以傳統上視為開啟或關閉。An example of this is stream classes, which are traditionally thought of as open or closed. 類別具有這類的慣例的實作器可能會選擇實作的公用方法，以自訂名稱，例如`Close`，該呼叫方法。The implementer of a class that has such a convention might choose to implement a public method with a customized name, such as `Close`, that calls the method. 因為必須明確地呼叫方法，一定會有危險的 unmanaged 的資源不會釋放，因為物件的取用者無法呼叫其方法。Because the method must be called explicitly, there is always a danger that the unmanaged resources will not be released, because the consumer of an object fails to call its method. 有兩種方式可避免此狀況：There are two ways to avoid this: - 將 managed 的資源包裝在物件衍生自。Wrap the managed resource in an object derived from . 您然後實作會呼叫方法執行個體。Your implementation then calls the method of the instances. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 SafeHandle 替代方法 」 一節主題。For more information, see "The SafeHandle alternative" section in the topic. - 實作完成項，以釋出資源時則不會呼叫。Implement a finalizer to free resources when is not called. 根據預設，記憶體回收行程會自動呼叫物件的完成項再回收其記憶體。By default, the garbage collector automatically calls an object's finalizer before reclaiming its memory. 不過，如果方法已被呼叫，為通常不必要的記憶體回收行程呼叫已處置的物件完成項。However, if the method has been called, it is typically unnecessary for the garbage collector to call the disposed object's finalizer. 若要避免自動最終處理，實作可以呼叫方法。To prevent automatic finalization, implementations can call the method. 當您使用的物件，例如存取 unmanaged 的資源， ，最好的作法是建立與執行個體`using`陳述式。When you use an object that accesses unmanaged resources, such as a , a good practice is to create the instance with a `using` statement. `using`陳述式就會自動關閉資料流並呼叫時正在使用它的程式碼已完成在物件上。The `using` statement automatically closes the stream and calls on the object when the code that is using it has completed. 如需範例，請參閱類別。For an example, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作方法。The following example shows how you can implement the method. [!code-cpp[System.IDisposable.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IDisposable.Dispose Example/CPP/idisposabledispose.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IDisposable.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IDisposable.Dispose Example/CS/idisposabledispose.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IDisposable.Dispose Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IDisposable.Dispose Example/VB/idisposabledispose.vb#1)]
